recipesJson.name: Soogurrr Kookys
recipesJson.author: That_Hohmie
recipesJson.description: I was watching a live mixing recently where wayne mixed a sugar cookie he obviously didn't like much... I took what he learned and adapted that recipe to make a version of my own. Good artists copy; Great artists steal!!! Anyway, I added some cream and butter awnnn in there and shit man!!! BOOM! Oh yeah, that cinnamon note from the cap graham settles a week in as the sugar cookie does its dance.
